definition: to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip

sentences.english: Moreover, the relatively high proportion of mature or over-mature forests shows that resources in support are insufficient.
sentences.chinese: 近成過熟林所佔比例較大，後備資源不足。

sentences.english: Factor in all the schools you’re applying to and any back-up options.
sentences.chinese: 考慮你所有申請的學校和後備選擇。

sentences.english: The driver turns off the engine and exits the car to retrieve my suitcase from the trunk.
sentences.chinese: 於是，司機停下車，幫我把行囊從後備箱裏卸了下來。

sentences.english: Israel said yesterday that it is calling up thousands of reservists .
sentences.chinese: 以色列昨天聲稱已經召集了成千上萬個後備軍。

sentences.english: Nickel-cadmium batteries are used to provide emergency back-up power on planes and trains.
sentences.chinese: 鎳鎘電池也用作飛機和火車的應急後備電源。

sentences.english: Ship 1 is available for use as a backup during the flight test program.
sentences.chinese: 一號機在在飛行試驗計劃中作爲試飛的後備。

sentences.english: It's in my suitcase. In the trunk.
sentences.chinese: 放在我汽車後備箱的行李裏。

sentences.english: The regular Army was supported by the Territorial Force, and by reservists.
sentences.chinese: 常備軍由地方自衛隊和後備軍支持。

sentences.english: But for convenience and shelf life, use dried fruit as your back-up plan.
sentences.chinese: 但爲了方便，保質期，你可以吧乾果作爲後備計劃。

sentences.english: Particularly prominent projects is the snow and ice back-up personnel training issues.
sentences.chinese: 尤顯突出的就是冰雪項目後備人才培養的問題。

sentences.english: I would just pile it all in the car and that would be enough.
sentences.chinese: 我常會把雜貨堆在後備箱，那樣就足夠了。

sentences.english: we just piled up all the groceries in the trunk of the car and drive home.
sentences.chinese: 我們會把雜貨堆放在車的後備箱裏，然後開車回家。

sentences.english: It has also analysed the gene-(ral) principle of backup UPS.
sentences.chinese: 分析了後備式UPS的基本原理。

sentences.english: It is common practice to make a back-up file for our documents.
sentences.chinese: 慣常做法是爲正本另立一個後備檔案。

sentences.english: First, the thesis systematically analyzes the present situation of AnQing agricultural potential resource.
sentences.chinese: 首先，對安慶市農業後備資源現狀進行了系統分析。

sentences.english: American reporter jumps down a car loathly, opened the mothball box of his car.
sentences.chinese: 美國記者不情願地跳下車來，打開了他轎車的後備箱。

definition: to lead a group/leader of a group/captain (of sports squad)
to heal a wound/to recuperate (from an injury)
St Paul/São Paulo, city in Brazil
